altTitles.ja: 湾岸MIDNIGHT C1ランナー

description.en:
By the 2010's, the Japanese racing scene is largely off the street and has moved onto the circuit thanks to heightened police enforcement. Most tuners from the old era have moved on from it, becoming everyday mechanics.
Shinji Ogishima is a rising automotive journalist who aspires to revive the tuning magazine, GT Cars, in the modern era.
While doing so, he encounters Nob Setoguchi. A young street racing rascal driving an FD RX-7. Who, despite being good behind the wheel, doesn't know anything technical about cars, driving, or journalism. And so Nob begins his journey as a budding car enthusiast with the revived GT Cars.

The Earth's existence is under threat once more as Itarim, the gods of other universes, seek to fill the void left by the Absolute Being. 

Sung Jinwoo has no choice but to send Beru, the shadow ant king, to awaken his son's powers and start him on the journey he once took. 

Suho must conquer the shadow dungeon and earn his place in the world of hunters as he navigates through a new world against a new evil looking to swallow the world whole.
description.ko:
줄거리

평범한 대학생으로 살아가던 성수호 죽음을 앞둔 순간, 잠들어 있던 그의 특별한 혈통이 깨어난다!

“일어나라.”

죽음을 거스르고 지배하는 헌터, 그가 선보이는 새로운 레벨업을 주목하라!

* 이 작품은 웹툰 <나 혼자만 레벨업>의 세계관을 이어받은 작품입니다.

altTitles.ja: 尾守つみきと奇日常。

altTitles.en: Tsumiki Ogami & the Strange Everyday Life.

altTitles.es: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.es-la: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.pt-br: Tsumiki Ogami e seu estranho coditiano.

altTitles.vi: Tsumiki Ogami Và Cuộc Sống DIệu Kỳ

altTitles.ru: Цумики Огами и странная повседневная жизнь

altTitles.fr: Ogami Tsumiki et l'étrange vie du quotidien

altTitles.vi: Tsumiki Ogami và Cuộc sống diệu kì!

description.en:
Today, we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings.

One human boy, Yutaka Shinsou, is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School, where many "Genjin" attend, he meets Tsumiki Ogami, a werewolf. She is cute, powerful, a little out of the ordinary, and kind.

When he spends time with her, Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.

The new normal graph of youth is about to begin.
description.es: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.fr:
Aujourd'hui, nous vivons à l'ère de la diversité. L'expression « non-humains » appartient au passé. Les « Genjin » vivent leur vie en interaction avec les êtres humains.

Un garçon humain, Yutaka Shinsou, est troublé. Il est tellement habitué à être en phase avec son environnement qu'il ne comprend plus ses propres sentiments. Au lycée Keiki, que fréquentent de nombreux « Genjin », il rencontre Tsumiki Ogami, un loup-garou. Elle est mignonne, puissante, un peu hors du commun et gentille.

Lorsqu'il passe du temps avec elle, le cœur de Yutaka est plus bruyant que d'habitude. Une vie quotidienne « inhabituelle » avec Tsumiki le loup-garou.

Le nouveau parcours normal de la jeunesse est sur le point de commencer.
description.ja:
ウェアウルフの尾守つみきさんと紡ぐ、「普通」じゃない日常――

多様性の時代とされる現代。ついこの間まで「人ならざる存在」だった「幻人」は今は人間と関わり合って生活しています。

舞台は、幻人が多く通う景希高校。そこにいたのは、ウェアウルフの尾守つみき（おがみつみき）さん。モフモフの耳と尻尾が揺れる、天真爛漫な美少女。

真層友孝（しんそうゆたか）くんは、悩める人間の少年。人間関係が原因で、自分のことが分からなくなりました。友孝くんはつみきさんと出会い、自分の「気持ち」を見つけていきます。

「…人間って大変だぁ～」
日常が変わっていく、つみきさんと一緒なら。

まだ誰も知らない、ニューノーマルな青春がここに。
description.pl:
Obecnie żyjemy w erze różnorodności. Wyrażenie „nie-ludzie” należy już do przeszłości. „Genjin” żyją w interakcji z ludźmi.

Pewien ludzki chłopiec, Yutaka Shinsou, jest zaniepokojony. Jest tak przyzwyczajony do bycia w zgodzie z otoczeniem, że nie rozumie już własnych uczuć. W Liceum Keiki, gdzie uczęszcza wielu „Genjin”, spotyka Tsumiki Ogami, wilkołaka. Jest urocza, potężna, trochę nietypowa i miła.

Kiedy spędza z nią czas, serce Yutaki staje się głośniejsze niż zwykle. Niezwykłe niecodzienne życie z wilkołakiem Tsumiki.
description.ru: Сегодня мы живём в эпоху культурного разнообразия. "Нелюди" постепенно ушли из словесного оборота. "Гендзины" живут своей жизнью, взаимодействуя с людьми. Один из человеческих мальчиков, Ютака Шинсо, кое-чем обеспокоен. Он настолько привык быть в гармонии со своим окружением, что перестал понимать свои собственные чувства. В средней школе Кэйки, где учатся многие "гендзины", он знакомится с оборотнем Цумики Огами. Она милая, сильная, немного странная и добрая... Когда Ютака проводит с ней время, его сердце почему-то бьется чаще обычного.
description.es-la: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.pt-br:
Hoje, vivemos numa era de diversidade. A frase “não-humanos” é coisa do passado. “Genjin” vivem suas vidas interagindo com seres humanos.

Um menino humano, Yutaka Shinsou, está preocupado. Ele está tão acostumado a estar em sintonia com o ambiente que não entende mais seus próprios sentimentos. No Colégio Keiki, onde muitos "Genjin" estudam, ele conhece Tsumiki Ogami, uma lobisomem. Ela é fofa, poderosa, um pouco fora do comum e gentil.

Quando ele passa um tempo com ela, o coração de Yutaka fica mais acelerado do que o normal. Girando uma vida cotidiana "incomum" com o lobisomem Tsumiki.

O novo gráfico normal da juventude está prestes a começar.

altTitles.en: A Former Brave Resident in the Dungeon

altTitles.ja: ダンジョン暮らしの元勇者
ダンジョン暮らしの元勇者 THE COMIC

description.en:
After killing the Demon Lord, Blum Dilmond was pursued by the kingdom and forced to leave the country. While spending days trying to avoid the assassins aiming at his neck, he suddenly came up with an idea. He could hide inside the dungeon that was once the Demon Lord’s hideout. If it’s there, then he could be safe.   
  
Without hesitating Blum went into the dungeon, but then he met someone unexpected in the lower levels, one of his former companions with whom he fought side by side against the Demon Lord. Moreover, a maid, called Irene, who once served the Demon Lord is also there. And so since their interests happened to match, the three of them decided to cooperate together to rebuild the worn-out dungeon, working earnestly in order to turn it into their own safe paradise.

title.en: Doteihen Reijou ni Hyoui Shita 800-nen Mae no Akujo wa Hissori Seishun o Tanoshinde Iru

altTitles.ja: ど底辺令嬢に憑依した800年前の悪女はひっそり青春を楽しんでいる

altTitles.ja-ro: Doteihen Reijou ni Hyoui Shita 800-nen Mae no Akujo wa Hissori Seishun wo Tanoshinde Iru

altTitles.en: The 800-Years-Old Villainess who Possessed a Low-Ranking Lady Peacefully Enjoyed her Youth

altTitles.es-la: La villana de 800 años que posee a una joven de poder bajo disfruta pacíficamente de su juventud

description.en:
Nora, who had been sealed for 800 years for threatening to destroy the world, was very bored. One day, she heard the voice of a girl—Cecily—wishing to die, and was awakened. By that time, she'd grown feeble, and her body had shriveled. Thus, Nora proposed to Cecily.

"If that's the case, would you lend me your body? In exchange, I promise that in a year, you'll have a friend, a lover, a warm family, and promising future prospect for your perfect restart!"

The "Incorrigible Villainess," Nora, was resurrected in the body of the "Withered Grass Lady," Cecily.
description.ja:
『稀代の悪女』であるノーラ＝ノーズは、その罪により800年もの間封印されている。
そんな彼女の最近の楽しみは、遠視の魔法で学校というものを視ること。
ある日いつものように学校を視ていると、「死にたい……」という助けを求める声が聞こえてきた。
「死にたいと思うなら、あなたの体を私に預けてみない？」
ノーラは声の主であった『枯草令嬢』と呼ばれるシシリーに憑依。
いじめられっ子だった彼女を取り巻く状況を改善させていく！
800年前の最強悪女、ハチャメチャ楽しい青春を過ごす！
description.es-la: Nora Noze, una poderosa maga que fue sellada debido a sus maldades, ha realizado un pacto con la joven Cecily para poseer su cuerpo y vivir su vida durante 1 año. Ahora Nora deberá afrontar la vida diaria de Cecily y de paso disfrutar las experiencias que nunca pudo en su vida pasada.

altTitles.ja: 拷問できるもんっ!

description.en: A world of turmoil where humans and demons continue to fight.The demon army captured Georgius, the supreme commander of the human army.A professional torturer is summoned to make the human military reveal.
description.ja:
人と魔族が争いを続ける騒乱の世界。
人類軍の最高司令官・ゲオルジウスを捕えた魔族軍は
人類軍の重要機密を吐かせるため拷問のプロを呼び出し、
情報を吐かせようとするのだが...!?

幼き拷問龍・グロゴアのエグイけど健気な拷問ファンタジーがいま、始まる...‼
description.es-la: En un mundo turbulento donde humanos y demonios se encuentran en constante conflicto, el ejército demoníaco captura al mismísimo comandante supremo de la humanidad, Georgius. Desesperados por obtener información crucial sobre los planes de sus enemigos, recurren a un profesional de la tortura: ¡Una joven dragoncita experta en el arte del tormento!

altTitles.ja: ガールズゾンビパーティー

description.en: One day, half of humanity - the men - suddenly turn into zombies. In such a world, can these high school students, who live normal lives,fend off the men who attack them and survive!? In a world where half of humanity is turning into deformed creatures, the girls' desperate survival begins!!
description.ja:
ある日突然、人類の半分――
男たちがゾンビと化した。
そんな世界で、普通に生きる高校生たちは
襲い掛かる男どもを振り切って生き延びられるのか!?

人類の半分が異形となりつつある世界で
少女たちの決死のサバイバル、始まる!!

title.en: Kuni ni Saikyou no Barrier wo Hattara Heiwa ni Narisugite Tsuihousaremashita ~Ore no Mahou ga Yabasugite, Bijo to Mazoku ni Kakomarerun da ga!?~

altTitles.ja: 国に最強のバリアを張ったら平和になりすぎて追放されました。～俺の魔法がヤバすぎて、美女と魔族に囲まれてるんだが！？～

altTitles.en: When I Put up the Strongest Barrier in the Country, It Became Too Peaceful and I Was Banished. They Did Know That That Barrier Isn't Permanent, Right?

altTitles.es-la: Cuando levanté la barrera más fuerte del país, se volvió demasiado pacífico y me desterraron. ¿Sabían que esa barrera no es permanente, verdad?

description.en:
A young man, Shield, can only use the beginner magic [Barrier] and has been looked down upon.

Despite putting up an ironclad barrier to protect the country, he is deported due to his fiancée's tricks. However, before he knew it, he had subjugated the strongest dragon (a young girl), was courted by beautiful women from other countries, and was being followed by a group of brutal demons!?

A new type of battle action begins, woven by Shield, a young man who can only protect himself, but whose defense is the strongest!
description.ja:
強固なバリアに覆われた大国ヘレナは、魔物からも守られて繁栄の一途をたどっていた。そんなバリアを張ったシールド・レイアレスは宮廷魔法師として高い地位を築いてはいたが、バリア魔法しか使えないと周囲からは見下されていた。そんな矢先、シールドの婚約パーティーでいきなり国家反逆罪で追放されてしまう…!

国を追われて金も地位も失い、人生のドン底に落ちたシールドだったが、彼が唯一使えるバリア魔法は常人離れしたとんでもないものだった! そんな規格外の力を求めて、ドラゴンや異国の美女たち、終いには凶悪な魔族たちにまで狙われていく…!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Tome wa Hane! Suzusato Koukou Shodoubu

altTitles.ja: とめはねっ!
とめはねっ! 鈴里高校書道部
とめはねっ！−鈴里高校書道部−

description.en:
Tales of a high-school calligraphy club.  
  
A story about a high-school calligraphy club on the verge of breaking up that enters in a major competition while overcoming problems. Yuki, a promising female judoist, and Yukari, a quiet Canadian-raised boy who just returned to Japan, end up joining the club for the sake of maintaining the membership required to keep the club. Together with the old club members with unique characters, they gradually discover the fun of calligraphy and work together to win in the competition.  
  
Tomehane! was nominated for best manga at the first two Manga Taisho.

Live action series adaptation (2010): [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/742-tomehane)

altTitles.ja: ヤンキー娘
帰ってください！ 阿久津さん

altTitles.zh: 请你回去吧！阿久津同学

altTitles.it: Per favore torna a casa, Akutsu-san!

altTitles.vi: Cút mẹ về nhà đi Akutsu!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor vá para casa, Akutsu-san!

description.en:
Ooyama-kun normally doesn’t get involved with Akutsu-san, a delinquent girl in his class, but for some reason she makes his house her hang-out place!

Will she do something horrible to him behind closed doors or will he chase her out? But dealing with Akutsu-san’s sexy, cute behavior in such a confined space… he’s sure to get flustered! He wants her to go home, but he also doesn’t?

A teasing comedy under a single roof!
description.it: Ooyama-kun normalmente non si fa coinvolgere da Akutsu-san, una ragazza delinquente della sua classe, ma per qualche motivo lei fa della sua casa il suo luogo di ritrovo!  Ooyama le farà qualcosa di orribile a porte chiuse o la caccerà fuori? Tuttavia aver a che fare con il comportamento sexy e carino di Akutsu-san in uno spazio così ristretto... è sicuro che si ecciterà!  Vuole che lei torni a casa e allo stesso tempo non vuole,  Una commedia stuzzicante sotto lo stesso tetto!
description.ja:
**俺の部屋がヤンキー娘のたまり場に!? ヤンキー×非リア充のからかいコメディ！**

普段は全く関わりのないクラスの不良女子・阿久津さんに何故か家をたまり場にされてしまった一人暮らしの大山くん。ガラの悪い阿久津さんに何かひどいことをされるのではと追い出そうとするのだが、無防備で距離感の近い彼女のエロカワイイ仕草にドギマギしてしまい…？ 帰ってほしいのに、帰ってほしくない!? 一つ屋根の下のからかいショートコメディ！

---

**Ore no heya ga yankī musume no tamariba ni!? Yankī × hi riajū no karakai komedi!**

Fudan wa mattaku kakawari no nai kurasu no furyō joshi Akutsu-san ni nazeka ie o tamariba ni sa rete shimatta hitorigurashi no Ōyama-kun. Gara no warui Akutsu-san ni nanika hidoi koto o sa reru node wa to oidasou to suru nodaga, mubōbi de kyori-kan no chikai kanojo no erokawaī shigusa ni dogimagi shite shimai…? Kaette hoshī no ni, kaette hoshikunai! ? Hitotsu yane no shita no karakai shōtokomedi!
description.ru:
Оояма-кун обычно не связывается с Акуцу-сан, девушкой-правонарушителем в его классе, но по каким-то причинам она делает его дом своим тусовочным заведением! Оояма сделает с ней что-нибудь ужасное за закрытыми дверями или он её прогонит? Он хочет, чтобы она пошла домой, но не хочет? Дразнящая комедия под одной крышей!  
  
**Notes:**   
- Yankee Musume (ヤンキー娘) is the pre-serialization name.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/NAGAOKA0)  
- [Artist's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=133935)
description.es-la: Ooyama-kun normalmente no se involucra con Akutsu-san, una chica yankee de su clase, ¡pero por alguna razón ella hace de su casa su lugar de reunión! ¿Ooyama le hará algo horrible cuando estén las puertas cerradas o la echará? Pero lidiar con el sexy y lindo comportamiento de Akutsu en un espacio tan reducido sera un problema…
description.pt-br: Ooyama geralmente não se envolve com com Akutsu-san, uma garota delinquente da sua turma, mas por alguma razão ela transformou o quarto dele no seu local de descanso! Será que ela vai fazer algo horrível para ele ou ele vai expulsar ela? Mas lidar com a sexy e fofa Akutsu-san em um espaço fechado... Ele com certeza vai ficar envergonhado! Ooyama quer que ela vá para casa, mas ele também não quer? Uma comédia provocante sob um mesmo teto!

altTitles.zh-ro: Du Bu Tian Xia: Te Gong Shen Yi Xiao Shou Fei

altTitles.zh: 毒步天下: 特工神医小兽妃

altTitles.en: Queen of Poison: The Legend of a Super Agent, Doctor, and Princess

description.en: She is an ace agent, the queen of medicine and poison. Sweet and adorable she looks; resolute and cunning she actually is. She is half an angel and half a devil. When she travels through time and stays in an orphan girl’s body, will she rewrite the history? “I quit the marriage with this coward girl. To my surprise, she is so shrewd and eloquent! How ignorant I am!” Some lord regrets. “She is such a hottie!” Some prince sighs. “

title.en: Aru Hi Totsuzen, Gal no Iinazuke ga Dekita

altTitles.ja: ある日、突然ギャルの許嫁ができた

altTitles.ja-ro: Aru hi Totsuzen, Gyaru no Iinazuke ga Dekita

altTitles.en: One Day, I Suddenly Got Myself a Gal Fiancée​
One Day, Out of the Blue, I Got a Gal's Forgiving Wife

description.en:
"Hey, hey, why are you always pretending to be asleep?"

Miran Katsuki, a positive gal who reigns in the upper class of the school caste, often asks Shuji Nagasawa, an otaku. I was confused by her suggestive behavior, but she unexpectedly announced that she was his fiancee!?

A school romantic comedy between two polar opposites, Yin and Yang, has begun!

title.en: My love for my roommate is one-sided

altTitles.ja: 同居人に片思いしてる百合漫画

altTitles.ja-ro: Doukyonin ni Kataomoi Shiteru Yuri Manga

description.en: Kael and Baby are neighbors who have been friends since childhood. Kael is a shy and reserved boy, while Baby is an outgoing and passionate girl. When Baby meets Kai, Kael's older brother, she is instantly attracted to him. Kael is also interested in Beryl, Baby's older sister. The two decide to collaborate to help each other set up a relationship with their siblings, but Kael keeps a secret...

altTitles.ja: 三角形の壊し方

description.en:
Koto, Aya, and Erika were secretly in love with each other.

Koto's thoughts reach Aya for a short while, but Aya disappears as if she had been spirited away.

Seven years later, however, Aya appears to Koto and Erika as she was then...

altTitles.ja: 新世界ビルダーズ～クラス24「体」で生き残れ～

altTitles.en: New World Builders: Survive with Class 24 "Body"

description.en: All of the students from Midorishino High's class 2-C are killed in a bus accident during a school trip. However, they are reincarnated as monsters in another world. Will the 24 reincarnated "bodies" of classmates be able to survive in a world ruled by a select few influential people with powers known as "gifts"?

title.en: Kishi Danchou no Musuko wa Akuyaku Reijou wo Dekiai suru

altTitles.ja: 騎士団長の息子は悪役令嬢を溺愛する

altTitles.en: The Knight Commander's Son Is Infatuated With the Villainess

description.en:
When Prince Alice abruptly ends their engagement, Ex, the Knight Commander's son, has a sudden recollection of his past life. Transported from an otome game, he recognizes the unfolding events. 

Refusing to accept the wrongful blame placed on the innocent villainess, he resolves to protect and claim her. Reincarnated with a mission, Ex cherishes the villainess as his chosen path in this heartwarming tale of love and reincarnation.

altTitles.ja: 怪獣８号 RELAX

description.en: A spin-off gag manga of “Kaiju No. 8”! The defense force members risk their lives to protect people from approaching monsters. But even these members have “off-duty” days to relieve their daily fatigue! Don’t miss the hilarious vacations the members of the force have to offer!

title.en: Daikenja no Manadeshi ~Bougyo Mahou no Susume~@COMIC

altTitles.ja: 大賢者の愛弟子～防御魔法のススメ～＠COMIC

description.en: Two childhood friends born in a remote village. One of the boys, Alfi, was good at everything, and grew up as a genius (+handsome) with four attributes of magic, and entered the elite magic school as a scholarship student. On the other hand, the other boy, Reese, was a seemingly mediocre and naughty boy who could only use defensive magic for beginners, but in fact he was discovered by a rare Sage and had been educated as a gifted child since he was a child! And Reese enrolls in the elite magic school with one extremely defensive magic, brilliantly destroying the common sense of childhood friends, teachers and students! An uncaring and selfish commoner pushes the aristocrats away and runs up the school caste at explosive speed!
description.ja: 辺境の村で生まれた幼馴染みの2人。1人は文武両道で魔法四属性持ちの天才（+イケメン）として育ち、エリート魔法学校の特待生入学を見事に勝ち取った。もう1人は初心者向けの防御魔法しか使えない、一見平凡で脳天気な少年。だが、平凡な方の少年リースは、実は稀代の大賢者に才覚を見出され、長年英才教育を受け続けていた！そして彼は極めつくした初心者魔法1つでエリート魔法学校に入学し、幼馴染みや教師や生徒たちの常識を華麗にぶち壊していく！

description.pt-br:
Uma historia sobre um incidente que transformou Shinji, Asuka e Misato em crianças.
(Creditos: https://www.reddit.com/r/evangelion/comments/1dlqvqr/found_media_the_doujin_wasnt_freaky/)

altTitles.ja: 呪術廻戦

description.en:
For some strange reason, Yuji Itadori, despite his insane athleticism would rather just hang out with the Occult Club. However, her soon finds out that the occult is as real as it gets when his fellow club members are attacked!

Meanwhile, the mysterious Megumi Fushiguro is tracking down a special-grade cursed object, and his search leads him to Itadori...
description.fr:
Yuuji est un jeune étudiant qui excelle dans le sport, notamment dans l'athlétisme, mais qui a un immense poil dans la main. Du coup, au lieu de parfaire ses capacités physiques qui pourraient lui permettre de devenir le meilleur de l'établissement, il s'est inscrit au club de recherches occultes du lycée. Son petit train-train va changer du tout au tout lorsqu'un véritable esprit malfaiteur vient menacer son école…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Ki-oon**
description.ru: Юдзи гений на поле! Вот только школьная активность его мало чем привлекает. Став частью клуба оккультных исследований он решает зажить тихой жизнью, но все меняется, когда в школе объявляются духи.
description.tr: Yuuji bir atletizm dehasıdır ama koşuya hiç ilgisi yoktur. Bilinmezleri Araştırma Kulübünde çok mutludur. Her ne kadar kulüpte eğlencesine bulunsa bile, okulda gerçek bir ruh ortaya çıkınca işler ciddiye biner! Hayat, Sugisawa Şehrindeki 3 Numaralı Lisedeki çocuklar için tuhaflaşmaya başlamak üzere!
description.uk: Ітадорі Юуджі - надзвичайно талановитий старшокласник із Сендаю. Утім, хоч він і вправний спортсмен, його не цікавлять спортивні клуби: він піклується про свого дідуся, що лежить у місцевій лікарні. Все змінюється, коли через жартівливий спіритичний сеанс на Юуджі та його друзів раптово нападають моторошні чудовиська, яких дивакуватий незнайомець, Фушіґуро Меґумі, чомусь називає прокляттями. Аби врятувати себе та друзів, Юуджі змушений ризикнути - і так випадково стати вмістилищем легендарного, наймогутнішого короля проклять. А потім на тобі - вирок: "тебе мають стратити". Ну і що робити? Тяжкий вибір, магічна школа, нові друзі й нові проблеми - так починається його шлях...
description.pt-br: Itadori Yuuji, um estudante do colegial com uma capacidade física única, tem como rotina visitar seu avô que está hospitalizado. Porém, um dia, o selo de um "objeto amaldiçoado" escondido em sua escola é rompido, fazendo surgir criaturas assustadoras. Para salvar seus colegas ele parte em direção ao colégio, quando algo inesperado acontece...!

title.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

altTitles.ja: 君のことが大大大大大好きな100人の彼女

altTitles.es-la: Las 100 Novias Que Te Quieren Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho

altTitles.ru: 100 девушек, которые очень-очень-очень-очень-очень сильно тебя любят

altTitles.zh-hk: 超超超超超喜歡你的100個女友

altTitles.pt-br: As 100 Namoradas que te Amam Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Mesmo.

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi no koto ga daidaidaidaidai suki na 100-nin no Kanojo

altTitles.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

description.en:
Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. 

Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
description.ru: Что может быть хуже отказа на признание в любви? Сотня отказов на признание в любви! Айдзё Рэнтаро – безнадёжный романтик, признавшийся в любви уже сто раз, но по необъяснимым причинам каждый раз получавший отказ. В один прекрасный день перед ним предстаёт сам Бог Любви и говорит, что его ужасная удача в любви обернулась вспять! Теперь Айдзё предстоит встретить 100 девушек "Соулмейтов" – каждая из них предназначена ему самой судьбой и без памяти влюблена в него! Но вот беда: ни у одного человека не должно быть столько соулмейтов. Если он не ответит хоть одной из них взаимностью, девушку ждёт смерть от несчастного случая! Теперь это дело любви и смерти, а выбор за Айдзё.
description.pt-br: Aijou é um garoto que tem muito azar no amor e já foi rejeitado mais de 100 vezes. Desesperado ele vai num templo pedir ajuda aos deuses. E seu desejo foi atendido, para cada rejeição ele terá uma alma gêmea. Mas isso se tona uma maldição quando ele fica sabendo que se elas não forem felizes ao lado de sua alma gêmea, ele, elas vão morrer… Mas que merda, você ainda está lendo isso? Não escutou? São 100 garotas, 100! Não há tempo a perder!

title.en: Dragon Quest: The Great Adventure of Dai - Avan the Brave and the Demon King of Hellfire

altTitles.ja: ドラゴンクエスト ダイの大冒険 勇者アバンと獄炎の魔王

altTitles.ja-ro: Dragon Quest: Dai no Daibouken - Yuusha Avan to Gokuen no Maou

description.en: The Demon King's army led by Hadler is attacking the world. The Kingdom of Carl and Princess Flora stand up to stop the invasion. And then there's young Avan! Another heroic story begins now!

altTitles.ja: 文豪ストレイドッグス

altTitles.en: Stray Dogs of the Literary Masters

description.en: Nakajima Atsushi was kicked out of his orphanage, and now he has no place to go and no food. While he is standing by a river, on the brink of starvation, he rescues a man whimsically attempting suicide. That man is Dazai Osamu, and he and his partner Kunikida are members of a very special detective agency. They have supernatural powers, and deal with cases that are too dangerous for the police or the military. They're tracking down a tiger that has appeared in the area recently, around the time Atsushi came to the area. The tiger seems to have a connection to Atsushi, and by the time the case is solved, it is clear that Atsushi's future will involve much more of Dazai and the rest of the detectives!
description.ru: Нашего героя выгнали из детского дома. Стоя у реки, он думал о голодной смерти, но чудом умудрился спасти самоубийцу. Этот человек, оказалось, состоит в детективном агентстве. В агентстве со сверхъестественными способностями. И только им подвластно решение проблем, за которые боятся браться даже военные. Теперь жизнь нашего героя изменится кардинально. А как именно читайте далее.

title.en: The Kicked Out S-Rank Appraiser Creates the Strongest Guild

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihou Sareta S-kyuu Kanteishi wa Saikyou no Guild wo Tsukuru

altTitles.ja: 追放されたS級鑑定士は最強のギルドを創る

altTitles.zh-hk: 被放逐的S級鑑定士打造了最強公會

description.en: Appraiser Laurent was kicked out from his guild 『Golden Hawk』. It was a result of one-sided jealousy from the guild leader, Lucius. Feeling hurt and crushed by the sudden dismissal, a female mage named Lilianne gave him a helping hand. Together with her, he decided to create a new guild to mess with Lucius. Eventually, those talents that Laurent found through his appraisal skill will create the strongest guild.

title.en: Shuu ni Ichido Classmate wo Kau Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 週に一度クラスメイトを買う話～ふたりの時間、言い訳の五千円

altTitles.ja-ro: Shuu ni Ichido Classmate wo Kau Hanashi ~ Futari No Jikan, Iiwake No Gozen'en

altTitles.en: A Story About Buying a Classmate Once a Week ~ 5,000 Yen for an Excuse to Spend Time Together

altTitles.ko: 일주일에 한 번 클래스메이트를 사는 이야기 ~두 사람의 시간, 변명의 오천 엔~

description.en:
Once a week, Miyagi pays 5,000 yen to her classmate Sendai. The 5,000 yen is to buy three hours of Sendai’s time, which gives the right for Miyagi to give her orders. 

Miyagi is at the bottom of the school caste while Sendai is at the top. The two, who never crossed paths at school, spend time together after school under such a contract. Miyagi’s orders are determined by her mood of the day, and Sendai cannot disobey. One day after school… 

Miyagi calls Sendai to her room and gives her an order that she usually does not give.
description.es-la: Una vez a la semana, Miyagi paga 5.000 yenes a su compañera de clase Sendai.Los 5.000 yenes son para comprar tres horas de tiempo de Sendai, lo que da derecho a Miyagi a darle órdenes.Miyagi está en la parte baja de la casta escolar mientras que Sendai está en la alta. Las dos, que nunca se han cruzado en la escuela, pasan tiempo juntas después de clase bajo este contrato.Las órdenes de Miyagi vienen determinadas por su estado de ánimo del día, y Sendai no puede desobedecerlas.Un día después de clase... Miyagi llama a Sendai a su habitación y le da una orden que no suele dar.

title.en: Tensei Shite Shota Ouji ni Natta Kensei wa, Katsute no Deshi ni wa Zettai ni Baretakunai

altTitles.ja: 転生してショタ王子になった剣聖は、かつての弟子には絶対にバレたくないっ

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Shite Shota Ouji ni Natta Kensei ha, Katsute no Deshi ni ha Zettai ni Baretakunai

altTitles.en: Reincarnated. The Sword Saint Who Became A Shota Prince To His Former Disciples ~ I Don't Want My Former Disciples To Find Out

altTitles.es-la: El Maestro de la Espada reencarna como un pequeño príncipe. ¡Su Antiguo Discípulo ahora es su tutor!

description.en:
Sword Saint Brise saved the country with his unique swordsmanship.

At the end of his magnificent life, he is reincarnated as the country's youngest prince, still retaining his memories. He seeks freedom again and aspires to enter the elementary school of knight school. Even though he is an invincible swordsman, he unexpectedly fails! 

“I came to get you.”

He looks like a child, but inside he's an invincible former swordsman. In his reincarnation, he is picked up by his former disciple!?

title.en: Heimin Shusshin no Teikoku Shoukan, Munou na Kizoku Joukan wo Juurin shite Nariagaru

altTitles.ja: 平民出身の帝国将官、無能な貴族上官を蹂躙して成り上がる

altTitles.en: The Rising of the Commoner-Origin Officer: Beat up All the Incompetent Noble Superiors!

description.en:
All the bosses are annoying! The reincarnated strongest magician's trampling and subjugation begins!

Hazen Heim, a newly appointed imperial general, is demoted to the front line because he is a commoner. There were a lot of incompetent people, such as "a trash superior who takes advantage of his position to steal the achievements of his subordinates", "an evil subordinate who keeps bullying people below him", and "a top who is too opportunistic to do anything''. 

However, Hazen has the experience and overwhelming ability as the strongest magician that he cultivated in his previous life. He slaughters his malevolent subordinates in accordance with military law, and completely refutes his superiors who complain. He achieved extraordinary results, such as making peace with a hostile tribe by teaming up with a genius girl, and defeated all the annoying bosses!

An exhilarating upstart fantasy about an unscrupulous superior!

altTitles.ja: ××しないで！月峰さん。

description.en: Hidaka Akira is a high school student who loves solitude. He avoids the crowds in his class and decides to eat alone, but there is someone who disturbs his peace. It is Tsukimine Chiyo, the girl at the highest level in the school hierarchy, a girl who is absolutely beautiful. Tsukimine called Akira and asked him to do his "usual thing". What kind of "normal" did they mean, and why were her clothes off...?
description.pt-br: Hidaka Akira é um estudante do ensino médio que adora a solidão. Ele evita as multidões em sua classe e decide comer sozinho, mas há alguém que perturba sua paz. Trata-se de Tsukimine Chiyo, a garota do mais alto nível na hierarquia da escola, uma garota absolutamente linda.

altTitles.ja: リィンカーネーションの花弁

description.en: Striving for talent, Senji Touya tries everything he can so he can find it. Kendou, dancing, swimming, basketball, soccer, chess… anything he tries, he fails to exceed it. One day, his classmate, Haito, came to school for once in a long time. Senji refers to her as someone who "has it" or someone who has talent. Later on, he found out that she isn't just someone who has talent, but someone who "took" the talent of herself in her past life. And, those who "took" the talent from their past lives, are also known as "Returners"…

In the world of the game 'Aola Star', he is hailed as "No. 1" and has dominated the rankings for years, using the strongest Yabi to fight his way to the top. In the real world, he is a nobody at the bottom of the social ladder who holds a secret crush on the school goddess.   
  
One day, the two worlds begin to intersect… but which one is the true 'real world'?

altTitles.ja: スプラトゥーン

description.en: A serialization for the hit game Splatoon with manga-original characters featuring Team Blue's, and more specifically Goggles', antics.

title.en: Dungeon ga Arawarete 5-nen, 15-sai de Dungeon ni Idomu Koto ni Shita.

altTitles.ja: ダンジョンが現れて5年、15歳でダンジョンに挑むことにした

altTitles.ja-ro: Dungeon ga Arawarete Go-nen, Juugo-sai de Dungeon ni Idomu Koto ni Shita.

altTitles.es-la: 5 AÑOS DESPUÉS DE QUE APARECIERAN LAS DUNGEONS, ME ATREVO A DESAFIARLAS A LA EDAD DE 15 AÑOS

altTitles.en: Five Years After The Dungeons Appeared, I Dare to Challenge at The Age of 15

description.en:
Dungeons appeared in the world five years ago. Police and military are unable to enter these enigmatic spaces, and entry is permitted solely by the free will of individuals aged 15 and above. Leveling up is possible, fantasy items can be acquired, and for some, the transformation can lead to becoming astonishingly beautiful.

Yuuta Rokujou has lived a life of being bullied since his kindergarten days. Due to this, he decided not to attend Dungeon High School that everyone else went to, rather, on his fifteenth birthday, he decided to challenge a dungeon alone.

This story is about how Yuuta, under such circumstances, became stronger than anyone else, becoming one of the twelve individuals capable of moving the world, known as the ‘Twelve Heroes.’

altTitles.ja-ro: Jibun no Koto ga Katte ni Manga ni Sareteru Onnanoko

altTitles.ja: 自分の事が勝手に漫画にされてる女の子

description.en: A normal school girl suddenly finds out her life is being turned into a webmanga on Twitter by some random artist named "Pageratta"

title.en: Sono Bisque Doll wa Koi o Suru

altTitles.ja: その着せ替え人形は恋をする

altTitles.es-la: Esa muñeca de porcelana está enamorada

altTitles.th: หนุ่มเย็บผ้ากับสาวนักคอสเพลย์

altTitles.vi: Cô Nàng Nổi Loạn X Chàng Thợ May
Nàng Búp Bê Thử Đồ Của Tôi Biết Yêu

altTitles.ja-ro: Sono Bisque Doll ha Koi wo Suru

altTitles.en: The Bisque doll is falling in love

description.en: Wakana Gojou is a fifteen year old high-school boy who was socially traumatized in the past due to his passions. That incident left a mark on him that made him into a social recluse. Until one day he had an encounter with Kitagawa who is a sociable gyaru, who is the complete opposite of him. They soon share their passions with one another which leads to their odd relationship.
description.fr:
Wakana Gojo est un lycéen solitaire. Son rêve est de devenir artisan et de fabriquer les poupées traditionnelles pour le Hina Matsuri. Mais comme cette passion n’est pas très virile, il la cache et ne se fait pas remarquer. Jusqu’au jour ou Marine Kitagawa, la fille la plus populaire du lycée, le voit se servir d’une machine à coudre ! Contre toute attente elle lui demande de devenir son couturier pour réaliser… des tenues de cosplay !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.tr: Wakana Gojou, vadesi geçmiş tutkuları nedeniyle toplumsal travmaları olan 15 yaşında bir liselidir. Bu olayın bıraktığı iz onu toplumdan uzak biri haline getirdi. Bir gün kendisinin tam zıttı, arkadaş canlısı bir gal olan Kitagawa ile karşılaşır. Kısa zamanda garip ilişkilerini yönlendiren tutkularını paylaşırlar.
description.uk:
Вакана Ґоджьо — п’ятнадцятилітній учень старшої школи, в минулому отримав серйозну психологічну травму на фоні свого захоплення. Внаслідок чого хлопець ізолював себе від соціуму і почав вести затворницький образ життя.
Так було би і на далі, але в життя Ґоджьо буквально увірвалась Кітаґава — дружелюбна і комунікабельна дівчина, повна його протилежність. Досить швидко вони розділили хоббі один одного, що і привело до їх досить дивних, але міцних відносин.
description.vi: Wakana Gojou 15 tuổi là 1 học sinh cao trung từng bị tổn thương tâm lý trong quá khứ do sở thích kỳ lạ của mình. Chuyện đó đã khiến cậu trở nên nhút nhát, rụt rè. Cho tới ngày nọ Gojou tình cờ gặp Kitagawa – một Gyaru – người có tính cách trái ngược hoàn toàn với cậu ấy. 2 người họ hóa ra đều có những điểm chung và đã tạo thành một mối quan hệ hài hước
description.es-la: Wakana Gojou es un joven de quince años de edad que se vio traumatizado socialmente en el pasado debido a sus pasiones. Ese incidente le dejó una marca que lo convirtió en un recluso social. Hasta que un día tuvo un encuentro con Kitagawa, una gyaru sociable, que es todo lo contrario a él. Pronto comparten sus pasiones entre sí, lo que da lugar a su extraña relación.
description.pt-br: Wakana Gojou é um garoto de quinze anos que foi socialmente traumatizado no passado devido a suas paixões. Aquele incidente deixou uma marca nele que o fez ser um recluso social. Até que um dia ele teve um encontro com Kitagawa, que é um gyaru sociável, que é o completo oposto dele. Eles logo compartilham suas paixões uns com os outros, o que leva a um relacionamento estranho.

altTitles.ja: ブラックチャンネル

description.en: In order to make his videos more entertaining, the demonic Youtuber Black (and his sidekick Camera-chan) makes contracts with humans to film their despicable true natures by giving them mysterious powers and teach them a lesson to expose the hidden side of humans, games, and hobbies.

altTitles.ja: きみは, ニーナじゃない
きみは ニーナじゃない

description.en: The only solace for this young man, who has withdrawn into his own shell after a heartbreak, is watching his "idol" on stream. Then one day, he suddenly finds himself hiding from a girl who turns out to be his "idol"...? A life-changing romance between a heartbroken boy and a streamer begins!
description.pt-br: Aoba é um jovem que sofreu um trauma devido a um terrível término de relacionamento. Por conta disso, desenvolveu medo de interagir com outras pessoas, deixou seu emprego e passou a viver fazendo trabalhos temporários, tendo como única alegria assistir às transmissões de sua streamer favorita. Certo dia, ao ser abordado por uma garota que costumava ver em seu caminho de volta para casa, ele acaba concordando em morar com ela? Ele fica surpreso ao descobrir que ela era justamente sua streamer favorita... Assim, tem início um romance transformador entre um rapaz de coração partido e uma streamer!

altTitles.ja: 円舞曲は白いドレスで

description.en:
At the beginning of the XX century, the relationship between England and Japan was strained. England wanted to extend its influence over Japan, and Japan wasn't willing to let any other culture pass its borders. Koto, though, a Japanese girl, didn't care if the people she meets have almond shaped eyes or not, or if they wear a kimono or a western dress. Actually, she is fascinated by this foreign way of life that brings so many innovations into Japan. More than anything else, it's the clothing that seems to grab her attention, as she wants to become a tailor and create dresses for women of every culture.  
  
Unfortunately though, she's a woman, so she knows her dream will end as soon as she gets married. She will have to start acting like a noble and a respectable woman would. In fact, she is betrothed to Masaomi Kidoin, the second born of one of the most important and oldest families of Japan. The day she's told she will marry Masaomi, Koto attends a ball at the British Embassy and meets Sagitto, a half English and half Indian spy that captures her imagination and heart. But can their love story have a happy ending when the British and the Japanese are tracking down Sagitto because they want him dead, and Koto is forced to live a life that doesn't fit her?

title.en: Trapped in a Cursed Game as an NPC

altTitles.ko: 망겜 속에 갇혔다 근데 이제 NPC를 곁들인

altTitles.en: Trapped in a Cursed Game, but Now With NPCs

description.en:
I'm going to live a normal life!

...said Shari Azriel, the apothecary of the Dover village.

Then one day, I realised that I possessed an NPC in a video game! I've been locked up here for two years, and I only just noticed.

If I can't get out of the game...
"A, in their 20's, was found starved to death while playing VR games."
This could be what I'm remembered as!

"I have to get out!"

However, it was too late when I came to the realisation that... I can't log out because of an error!

That means, the only way out would be approaching the male lead, "the Lord of Nightmares," and helping his comrades defeat the final villain. So I have no choice but to wait until the game ends...

The difficulty level, the story, the likelihood of failure in such a heinous game, a game that nobody won before...

"The Lord of Nightmares has a strong urge to kill you."

Somehow, I believe that dying by the male lead's hands would be faster.

title.en: The Lecture You Would Never Want Your Parents to Give You

altTitles.ja: 親に絶対されたくない説教

altTitles.fr: Le sermon que vous ne voudriez jamais recevoir de vos parents

altTitles.ru: Лекция, которую вы бы не хотели услышать от родителей

altTitles.vi: Bài Thuyết Giáo mà ta Không bao giờ Muốn nghe từ phụ Huynh

altTitles.es-la: El regaño que nunca quisieras recibir de tus padres
La charla que nunca quieres que te den tus padres.

title.en: A Certain Middle-Aged Man's VRMMO Activity Log

altTitles.en: The Record by an Old Guy in the world of Virtual Reality Massively Multiplayer Online

altTitles.ja: To Aru Ossan no VRMMO Katsudouki

altTitles.ru: Некий старик и его журнал активности в VRMMO

altTitles.ja: とあるおっさんのVRMMO活動記

altTitles.en: A Playthrough of a Certain Dude's VRMMO Life

altTitles.pt-br: O Diário Do VRMMO De Um Certo Homem de Meia-idade

description.en: Typical company employee Tanaka Daichi(38 years old, single) loves games and plays a new type of VRMMO called "One More Free Life Online" under the username "Earth". Inside this free world he chose several skills that are generally regarded as useless. Be it wasting time crafting potions, cooking up pointlessly tasty food, or hunting monsters with some absurd weapon he crafted, he simply enjoys playing the game.
description.pt-br: Típico funcionário empresarial Tanaka Daichi(38 anos de idade, Solteiro) Ama jogos e joga um novo tipo de VRMMO chamado "One More Free Life Online" sobre o nome de "Earth". Dentro deste mundo ele escolheu várias skills que geralmente são inúteis. Isso é fazer poções, Cozinhar comidas sem gosto algum, ou caçar monstros com alguma arma feita de maneira absurda, ele simplesmente se diverte jogando o jogo.

description.en: Ge ge's name is You Tiao, Di di's name is Soya. A cute comedy series about their daily lives!

altTitles.ja: ハニーブラッド

description.en: When the daughter of a shaman gets "strung up" with a centuries-old vampire, is it love or something more sinister that binds them? From Narae Lee, artist of the hit OEL manga ’Maximum Ride,’ comes the story of two misfits and their quirky, fantastical romp to find one another.

altTitles.th: โนรางามิ เทวดาขาจร

altTitles.ja: ノラガミ

description.en: Yato is a minor god whose dream is to have a lot of followers worshiping him and praying to him. Unfortunately, his dream is far from coming true since he doesn't even have a single shrine dedicated to him. To make things worse, the only partner he had to help him solve people's problems, had just quit the job. His godly existence and luck just might change when he stumbles upon Iki Hiyori in her attempt to save him from an oncoming bus; a feat which also leaves her in quite a predicament so she is stuck with him until her problem gets resolved. Together with Hiyori and his new partner-weapon Yukine, Yato will do everything he can to gain fame, recognition and just maybe, one shrine dedicated to him, as well.
description.pt: Yato é um deus menor, cujo sonho é ter um monte de seguidores adorá-lo e orar com ele. Infelizmente, o seu sonho está longe de se tornar realidade desde que ele não tem sequer um único santuário dedicado a ele. Para piorar as coisas, o único parceiro que tinha que o ajudava a resolver os problemas das pessoas, tinha acabado de sair do trabalho. Sua existência divina e a sorte só pode mudar quando ele se depara com Hiyori Iki e salva sua vida, um feito que também deixa em muito a situação para que ela está presa com ele até que seu problema é resolvido. Juntamente com Hiyori e sua nova Yukine parceiro de armas, Yato vai fazer tudo que puder para ganhar fama, reconhecimento e apenas talvez, um santuário dedicado a ele, também.
description.ru: «Бог, который может мечом отменить приговор.» В мире людей есть Бог, который может проникнуть в самое сердце человека. Когда вы грустите, когда вы устали, если вы посмотрите наверх, до самого рая, то увидите номер телефона. Но самое важное – не звонить! Если вы позвоните, перед вами появится парень, который с наглым выражением лица скажет: «Возрадуйся, я – Бог.» Если это произойдет, то что вы будете делать?
description.pt-br: Yato é um deus menor, cujo sonho é ter um monte de seguidores adorá-lo e orar com ele. Infelizmente, o seu sonho está longe de se tornar realidade desde que ele não tem sequer um único santuário dedicado a ele. Para piorar as coisas, o único parceiro que tinha que o ajudava a resolver os problemas das pessoas, tinha acabado de sair do trabalho. Sua existência divina e a sorte só pode mudar quando ele se depara com Hiyori Iki e salva sua vida, um feito que também deixa em muito a situação para que ela está presa com ele até que seu problema é resolvido. Juntamente com Hiyori e sua nova Yukine parceiro de armas, Yato vai fazer tudo que puder para ganhar fama, reconhecimento e apenas talvez, um santuário dedicado a ele, também...

description.en: There was someone who set out after receiving orders from the Absolute One who first unified the continent to learn the secret of immortality. He believed that he would definitely discover the secret of immortality even if he had to travel all over the world. He never returned until the Absolute died and the empire collapsed, leaving behind only numerous speculations and gradually being forgotten in people's memories. And after a long time...
description.ru:
От создателя знаменитой манхвы «Мастер»! 
 
Могучий правитель, объединивший континент, послал своего самого отважного воина на поиски секрета бессмертия. Правитель был уверен, что тайна бессмертия будет раскрыта, даже если придётся искать её по всему миру. Однако... тот так и не вернулся. Правитель скончался. Империя пала. О воине ещё долго говорили, но со временем люди начали забывать и его. И вот, спустя многие годы...

altTitles.ja: 妄想先生

description.en: The beautiful English teacher Momoko Irosaki receives what she thinks are the lustful gazes of her male students every day... or so she misunderstands!? What goes on in the school life of a teacher who inadvertently indulges in fantasies full of allure...?
description.ja: 美人英語教師の色咲先生は、日々男子生徒から思春期真っ盛りの視線を浴びている…のは勘違い!? ついお色気全開の妄想をしてしまう先生の学校生活は――…。ちょっとえっちでかなり笑える妄想スクールコメディ!!
description.vi: Irosaki-sensei, một giáo viên trẻ xinh đẹp, hoạt bát,... Nói chung là mặt tiền cô rất  tuyệt với, học sinh đứa nào đứa nấy cũng mê. Nhưng thật ra "mặt trong" của cô lại không được xán lạn đến vậy. Và rồi cô gặp một cậu học trò yêu thích môn tiếng anh mà cô đang giảng dạy, thay vì nghĩ rằng "ồ, siêng quá ta", thì trong đầu cô lại chỉ có vô vàn suy nghĩ đồi trụy rồi tự gán hết lên người cậu học sinh ấy, nói chung là ngây ngô lắm cả nhà XD.

description.en:
Stigmata (聖痕); traces corresponding to the significant religious meaning among the marks on a person’s body.
 
Xion was rescued with lost memory from a village that was terribly slaughtered when he was young.

While living as an apprentice priest in a neighborhood chapel hoping to live a peaceful life, he accidently saved the pontifex (high priest), Parvellone, with his favor, Xion was ascended to Zion, the capital of the Holy Kingdom.

5 years later.
Xion was captured in a dungeon for possessing ‘something he shouldn’t have’ and tortured by the Holy King, Siennas, then Xion died after discovering he was betrayed by Parvellone, whom he believed.
However the next moment, on the day of the Holy King’s coronation 5 years ago, Xion was woken up from none other than Siennas’ body…
description.ko:
성흔(聖痕); 사람의 몸에 생긴 징표 중에서 특별히 종교적 의미를 지니고 있는 흔적.

어린 시절 끔찍하게 학살당한 마을에서 기억을 잃은 채 구조된 시온.
굴곡 없는 삶을 살길 희망하며 이웃 마을 신전의 견습 신관으로 지내던 중, 우연히 대신관 파르벨로네를 구해 주고 그의 호의로 성국의 수도 제온에 올라가게 된다.

그로부터 5년 뒤.
시온은 ‘가져서는 안 될 것’을 가지고 있다는 이유로 지하 감옥에 갇혀 성왕 시에나스에게 모진 고문을 받고, 믿었던 파르벨로네에게 배신을 당했다는 사실을 알게 된 뒤 숨을 거둔다.

그러나 다음 순간 시온은 5년 전 성왕의 즉위식 날, 다름 아닌 시에나스의 몸에서 눈을 뜨게 되는데….

title.en: Yuuryou Bukken Mou Dame Sou: Furo, Toilet to Tenshi wa Kyoudou desu

altTitles.ja: 優良物件もうダメ荘　～風呂、トイレと天使は共同です～

altTitles.en: Excellent Property: This Dormitory Is Full of Losers  ~Communal Toilets and Angels~

description.en: A story about a 70-year-old super cheap apartment named "Damesou" near the coast of a rural village with a communal bathroom, washstand, kitchen, and toilets, and the losers taking residence here!

The raid failed. 

In a desperate situation due to the impending suicide bombing of the dungeon boss, Lee Gon-woo was betrayed by his teammates, and abandoned in the boss’s room. Just when he thought it was all over, a dagger suddenly fell into his hands. And from that moment his life changed dramatically.

His life was saved, but all the levels he gained with such difficulty have reset, making him level 1.

[You have caught a "mosquito". Your level has increased.]

"My level should have gone up, but why is nothing happening?!"
description.ru:
Рэйд провалился. 
В отчаянном положении из-за готовящегося самоподрыва босса данжа преданный тиммейтами Ли Гон-у остался один в комнате босса.
Когда он думал, что уже всё кончено, неожиданно в его руки попадает кинжал. И с этого момента его жизнь кардинально меняется.
Его жизнь спасена, но он снова вернулся на первый уровень, который с таким трудом поднимал...
[Вы поймали "комара". Ваш уровень повышен.]
Действительно, уровень должен был подняться, но почему никаких изменений?

altTitles.ja: キコリの異世界譚
キコリの異世界譚 ～転生した少年は、斧1本で成り上がる～

description.en:
No cheats or special abilities! A boy who reincarnated into another world aims to rise to the top with just effort and determination, starting with a single axe!

Reincarnated into another world, Kikori was shunned in his hometown village as being possessed by a demon. With only an axe he received when leaving his hometown, he makes his way to Neergen, a defensive city at the forefront of adventurers battling monsters.

Despite his lack of experience and skill, Kikori decides to live as a harsh adventurer to earn money for survival. While barely escaping death in battles with monsters, he is supported by his first companions and, through sheer effort and determination, rushes towards becoming the strongest (physically) adventurer!
